```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(gridExtra)
library(modelr)
library(grid)
library(ggplotify)
library(vtable)
    

```

```{r}
heights <- modelr::heights
```

```{r}
heights |> 
  select(income, height) |> filter(income < 300000) |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = height, y = income)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
